EFI_GUID_DEFINED_SECTION Struct Reference


Data Fields

EFI_COMMON_SECTION_HEADER CommonHeader
EFI_GUID SectionDefinitionGuid
UINT16 DataOffset
UINT16 Attributes

Detailed Description

Leaf section which is encapsulation defined by specific GUID

Field Documentation

UINT16 EFI_GUID_DEFINED_SECTION::Attributes

Bit field that declares some specific characteristics of the section contents.

EFI_COMMON_SECTION_HEADER EFI_GUID_DEFINED_SECTION::CommonHeader

Common section header. CommonHeader.Type = EFI_SECTION_GUID_DEFINED.

UINT16 EFI_GUID_DEFINED_SECTION::DataOffset

Contains the offset in bytes from the beginning of the common header to the first byte of the data.

EFI_GUID EFI_GUID_DEFINED_SECTION::SectionDefinitionGuid

GUID that defines the format of the data that follows. It is a vendor-defined section type.
